name: KOGOSEI
description:
LudumDare46 IP DISCLAIMER  : I did not work in any of the visual or sound asset from the game, I mostly used stuff from assets pack I own or free of use found online. (see list at the end). I worked alone on the project. Made with Unreal-Engine 4 and Blueprints. In KOGOSEI you are controlling the sun orientation and must light your plants to keep them alive.  Window's blinds will close and you'll have trouble to give sun to all your plant. If one of the plant stay out of the sunlight for to long you loose the game.

Assets list : 

Flowers_and_Plants_Nature_Pack (Unreal Engine MarketPlace) 
HouseplantPack (Unreal Engine MarketPlace) 
Seaside_Town Pack(Unreal Engine MarketPlace) 
Sounds and music for freesound.org
